decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
Condition : 2 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.

Condition : 3 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted ( Location Plan:  unnumbered. Drawings:   31FR - EP1,  Design and Access Statement, Flood Risk Assessment.. Received: 20/07/2016. 31FR - EE Revision 1. Received: 08/09/2016. 31FR - PE Revision 2, 31FR - PP2 Revision 2, 31FR - PP1 Revision 1. Received: 10/10/2016. ) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.

Condition : 4 - No additional windows or other glazed openings shall be formed in the walls of the extension hereby approved and no additional doors inserted in the building without the prior written consent of the Local Planning Authority.

Condition : 5 - No demolition or construction work shall take place on the site except between the hours of 0800 to 1800 on Mondays to Friday and 0800 to 1300 on Saturdays and none shall take place on Sundays and Public Holidays without the prior agreement of the Local Planning Authority.

Condition : 6 - No development shall be carried out until such time as the person carrying out the work is a member of the Considerate Constructors Scheme and its code of practice, and the details of the membership and contact details are clearly displayed on the site so that they can be easily read by members of the public.

Condition : 7 - The development hereby permitted shall only be carried out in accordance with the approved Subterranean Structural Statement and the basement shall not be occupied until all the measures in the Subterranean Structural Statement are implemented.

Condition : 8 - The development hereby permitted shall only be carried out in accordance with the approved Flood Risk Assessment and the basement shall not be occupied until all the measures in the Flood Risk Assessment are implemented.
Condition : 9 - The basement shall at no time be used or occupied as a separate dwelling independent of the main house and shall not be used as sleeping accommodation.
description: Creation of a basement incorporating a front lightwell to the house.
